definition: small to medium-sized bottom-dwelling food and game fishes of shallow coastal and fresh waters that make a drumming noise, study intensively, as before an exam
details:
noun
- small to medium-sized bottom-dwelling food and game fishes of shallow coastal and fresh waters that make a drumming noise
= synonyms: drumfish
- a hollow cast-iron cylinder attached to the wheel that forms part of the brakes
= synonyms: brake drum
- a musical percussion instrument
= synonyms: membranophone, tympan
- a cylindrical metal container used for shipping or storage of liquids
= synonyms: metal drum
- the sound of a drum
= example: the sound of a drum
- a bulging cylindrical shape
= synonyms: barrel
verb
- study intensively, as before an exam
= synonyms: swot, get up, cram, grind away, bone up, mug up, swot up
- play a percussion instrument
- make a rhythmic sound
= example: make a rhythmic sound
= synonyms: beat
